articles.content:

articles.title: Afghanistan: UN prepares polio vaccination campaign for children - ANI News
articles.description: Washington [US], October 23 (ANI): UN agencies are preparing to launch a polio vaccination campaign for all children under 5 in Afghanistan, Voice of America (VOA) reported on Saturday.

articles.title: US targeting Feb. 2022 to launch new lunar program Artemis - eNCA
articles.description: NASA said Friday it is now targeting February 2022 for the uncrewed lunar mission Artemis 1, the first step in America's plan to return humans to the Moon later this decade.
